resources.string:
1- Click on Facebook icon in Home Page
2- Log in to your Facebook account (100% Secure)
3- Browse videos on your account or paste a direct link to any Facebook post
4- Click on any video and start your download immediately
1- Click on YouTube icon in Home Page\n2- Paste any YouTube Link in the URL field and click (Load Videos)\n3- Select your favorite video quality and will start immediately

1- Click on Instagram icon in Home Page
2- Paste any Instagram Link in the URL field
3- You can also click on the Instagram icon to direct you to Instagram Application to copy post link
4- Click (Load URL) to start connecting Instagram servers
5- You can Play, Download the video by pressing on the Download button 6- You can also download Instagram photos and export them as PDF by clicking on the print button below the image
PLEASE NOTE THAT:\nYou can start any of the downloaders directly from the original Apps by selecting (Share) and then click on (Socio Downloader icon) in the sharing options dialog
